refnamediv.refpurpose: C gateway function which returns the type of a parameter in the Scilab memory

listitem.para: the position on the Scilab memory of the parameter for which we want to know the type (input argument)
the type (defined in the sci_types enum which you can find in stack-c.h) of the parameter at position StackPos in the Scilab memory

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: GetType is a C gateway function which returns the type of a parameter in the Scilab memory. You must include stack-c.h to benefit from this function.
WARNING: This API is deprecated from Scilab 5.2.0 and is going to be removed with Scilab 6.0. Please use API Scilab (the new Scilab API).

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: In this example, the C gateway function takes one input argument and prints the integer corresponding to the type of the variable sent as argument in the Scilab console.
